name: 2kPuzzle
description:
2kPuzzle is a word/color puzzle game specifically made for the 2kPlus jam. 
Compose the word "2KPLUS" and score ... more than 2k!

Jam's theme is "SHIFT" which is directly implemented as core gameplay mechanic: shift rows left or right.

Features:

  • floodfill stuff :)
  • word highlight
  • unique score system
  • increasing difficulty
  • ending with win message
  • pastel palette
  • in-game how to play instructions
  • mobile support

Many features didn't make it into these 1912k but I wanted to give priority to something appealing for the player, to make it more enjoyable, like a pastel color palette, an in-game how to play menu (very byte expensive), score and time on screen as well as a win message and mobile support.

I wanted to create a fully enjoyable and challenging game experience in just 2k, and  I must say, I'm pretty satisfied :D

Thanks to  KilledByAPixel for hosting the jam, and great job to all the other entries!

Tip1: Yeah, the game seems hard, it's a puzzle after all, but there are some strategies that will work pretty well once you find them, definitely beatable with some calm :)

Tip2: Please play it fullscreen,  it's much better!
